Frieza lets out a smile. Not his usual evil smile, it was unusually sincere, "The bond between you and Jeice is strong, it would be a sin for anyone to break it, even me. Your request is granted."

Burter and Jeice both kneel, slight traces of tears in their eyes, "Thank you, Lord Frieza!"

Dr. Gero looked at Frieza with indifference and nodded as he grabbed a second vial of serum and guided the two to his testing facility. He then gave the two a pair of vials with stoppers before speaking, "Do not drink these until I say so. I am going to monitor your results in my lab, so remain here."

Dr. Gero left the testing facility to head for his lab next door. Jeice looked up at Burter, "Why are you doing this? You didn't have to go through this with me..."

Burter looked away and spoke gently, "In case things go wrong in the test, I want to tell you something."

Jeice got a little confused, "What is it, Burter?"

Burter gulped and turned around, his face turning purple, "Jeice, I... I love you..."

Jeice laughed nervously, "You got me all scared there. I know you love me. We're friends, aren`t we?"

Burter got a little frustrated, "No, I mean I love you as in I'm gay for you!"

Jeice was shocked. He had no idea that Burter felt that way about him. Jeice smiled back, "In that case, I love you too, Burter."

Dr. Gero then started talking over an intercom, Okay, drink them now!"

Burter and Jeice nodded to each other and drank the vials. The felt uneasy and felt the world getting smaller around them. They were growing! But their clothes...
